metadata.title: CVE-2024-25710 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop') vulnerability inApache Commons Compress.This issue affects Apache Commons Compress: from1.3 through 1.25.0.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.26.0 which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
